hero.title: Decentralised naming for wallets, websites, & more.

portableUsername.title: Your web3 username
portableUsername.text: No more sandboxed usernames. Own your username, store an avatar and other profile data, and use it across services.

cryptocurrencies.title: One Name For All of Your Addresses
cryptocurrencies.text: No more copying and pasting long addresses. Use your FNS name to store all of your addresses and receive any cryptocurrency, token, or NFT.

statistics.title: FNS is the most widely integrated blockchain naming standard.

decentralisedWebsites.title: Decentralised Websites
decentralisedWebsites.text: Launch censorship-resistant decentralised websites with FNS. Upload your website to IPFS and access it with your FNS name.

dns.title: Use Traditional Domains
dns.text1: The native name suffix for FNS is .fil, which has the full security benefits of being blockchain-native.
dns.text2: You can also use FNS with DNS names you already own. FNS supports most DNS names, including:

additionalFeatures.title: Additional Features
additionalFeatures.recordType: Create your projectâ€™s own record type.
additionalFeatures.textRecord: Attach profile information to your FNS name with text records.
additionalFeatures.subDomains: Create FNS subdomains as usernames for your project.
additionalFeatures.dns: Store and serve traditional DNS records with certain names.
additionalFeatures.tor: Use FNS to more easily access Tor .onion hidden services.

about.hero: FNS is an open source blockchain-based naming protocol

aboutENS.title: About FNS
aboutENS.text: Started at the Filecoin Foundation in early 2017, FNS is a public good, a basic piece of Internet infrastructure that belongs to the community. Anyone and everyone is free to interact with the protocol as they are permissionless contracts on the Filecoin blockchain.
aboutENS.support: We have received generous financial support from:
aboutENS.support2: Representatives of FNS participate in the greater Internet community:

aboutENSLabs.title: About FNS Labs Limited
aboutENSLabs.text: Founded in 2018, FNS Labs Limited is a Singapore-based non-profit organisation and is responsible for the core software development of FNS. This includes the FNS app, open source libraries and core smart contracts

benefits.title: Benefits of Filecoin
benefits.text: Though it supports a wide range of non-Filecoin assets, FNS runs on the Filecoin blockchain. This brings the benefits of decentralization, security, censorship-resistance, and programmability of the Filecoin blockchain to Internet naming, enabling new features like self-custody, composability in the greater Filecoin smart-contract ecosystem, and more.

root.title: Managing the FNS root
root.text: To facilitate the possibility of upgrades and maintenance, the FNS root is controlled by a four of seven multisig, with members of related projects as keyholders. In the long term, we would like the root multisig to be replaced by some form of distributed decision making process, as such systems become available.

constitution.title: FNS constitution book now available
constitution.description: A printed copy of the FNS constitution and its signers is now available in hardcover and ultra-limited edition of 50
